fpmExplorer:Page.title: Link with URL
fpmExplorer:Page.introduction: The Field building block enables you to render fields with links.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: URL-based Navigation
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: You can add a DataFieldWithUrl annotation for a property and provide a URL. The field will render the value as a link, which navigates to the specified URL.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Intent-based Navigation
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: For intent-based navigation via semantic objects, please refer to the following topic.
